info.institution: DTIM (Département Traitement de l'Information et Modélisation),ONERA
info.summary:
Laurence Cholvy works as a Research Director in DTIM (Département Traitement de l'Information et Modélisation),ONERA, and his\her h-index is 15, g-index is 27. His\Her interests are :
 Modal Logic; First Order; Deontic Logic; Multi Agent System; Multiagent System;
